item.title: Controlling Virtualbox from the Terminal
item.description: from: https://www.techrepublic.com/article/how-to-run-virtualbox-virtual-machines-from-the-command-line/ Starting/stopping/pausing a VM Now the fun begins. First, you must know the name of the VM you want to run.
